name: FEMINIST MAJORITY THE
sampleDescriptions: In Support of an Equal Rights Amendment to the U.S. Constitution.
Support of continued U.S. engagement in Afghanistan to strengthen security and increased humanitarian assistance for Afghan women and girls.
Support for the development of policies to address workplace harassment, including sexual harassment.
